bibl.title: Lists of Gods on Papyri and in the Hermeneumata Pseudo-Dositheana: A Comparative Study. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Hermeneumata Pseudo-Dositheana. - The papyrological material [1-8: 5 papyri and 3 ostraca; 7 fragments probably belong to an educational context]. - Systematic comparison between the papyrus lists and those in the Hermeneumata.
bibl.seg: HUYS Marc and Ann PITTOMVILS, Lists of Gods on Papyri and in the Hermeneumata Pseudo-Dositheana: A Comparative Study. Avec résumé en anglais.

Hermeneumata Pseudo-Dositheana. - The papyrological material [1-8: 5 papyri and 3 ostraca; 7 fragments probably belong to an educational context]. - Systematic comparison between the papyrus lists and those in the Hermeneumata.
